email_body: it's one of those theoretically great trades, but those don't always work. Still, I'll put it on and win 7 times out of 10. just so hard for the market to rally the backwardation is so weak. can easily see h going under if no weather appears. slafontaine@globalp.com on 02/12/2001 09:41:04 AM To: jarnold@enron.com cc: Subject: h/j/k wish i had let you buy all of them-cash supriingly weak to me. so i bailed on the postion lost about 7 cts-not a disaster but a disappointment. flat px looks like a pig here depite my not being overly bearish the fundamentals. we hold or they take it down more??
